trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration section that defines the type that the service hosting environment instantiates for a particular transport.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个配置节，该配置节定义服务主机环境为特定传输实例化的类型。

trans-unit.source: If this section is empty, the default type is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果此节为空，则使用默认类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceHostingEnvironmentSection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceHostingEnvironmentSection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether ASP.NET compatibility mode has been enabled for the current application.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指定是否已为当前应用程序启用了 ASP.NET 兼容模式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if ASP.NET compatibility mode has been enabled for the current application; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已为当前应用程序启用 ASP.NET 兼容模式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, requests to [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] services flow through the ASP.NET HTTP pipeline and communication over non-HTTP protocols is prohibited.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性被设置为 `true` 时，对 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 服务的请求将流经 ASP.NET HTTP 管道，而非 HTTP 协议上的通信将被禁止。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of configuration elements that specifies prefix filters for the base addresses used by the service host.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个配置元素集合，这些元素指定服务主机所使用的基址的前缀筛选器。

trans-unit.source: A collection of configuration elements that specifies prefix filters for the base addresses used by the service host.
trans-unit.target: 一个配置元素集合，这些元素指定服务主机所使用的基址的前缀筛选器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceHostingEnvironmentSection" /> closes idle services at low memory.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指示 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceHostingEnvironmentSection" /> 是否在内存低时关闭空闲服务的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceHostingEnvironmentSection" /> closes idle services at low memory; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceHostingEnvironmentSection" /> 因内存不足而关闭空闲服务，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an integer that specifies the minimum amount of free memory that should be available to the system, before a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] service can be activated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个整数，它指定在激活 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 服务之前，系统应该具有的最小可用内存量。

trans-unit.source: An integer that specifies the minimum amount of free memory that should be available to the system, before a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service can be activated.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，指定在可以激活 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服务之前，系统应该具有的最小可用内存量。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether multiple IIS bindings per site are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否对每个站点启用多个 IIS 绑定。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if multiple IIS bindings per site are enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对每个站点启用多个 IIS 绑定，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: IIS consists of web sites, which are containers for virtual applications containing virtual directories.
trans-unit.target: IIS 由网站组成，这些网站是包含虚拟目录的虚拟应用程序的容器。

trans-unit.source: The application in a site can be accessed through one or more IIS binding.
trans-unit.target: 可通过一个或多个 IIS 绑定访问站点上的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: An IIS binding provides two pieces of information: a binding protocol and binding information.
trans-unit.target: 一个 IIS 绑定提供两条信息：绑定协议和绑定信息。

trans-unit.source: Binding protocol defines the scheme over which communication occurs, and binding information is the information used to access the site.
trans-unit.target: 绑定协议定义进行通信所依据的方案，而绑定信息是用于访问站点的信息。

trans-unit.source: An example of a binding protocol can be HTTP, whereas binding information can contain an IP address, Port, host header, etc.
trans-unit.target: 绑定协议的一个示例可以是 HTTP，而绑定信息可包含 IP 地址、端口、主机标头等。

trans-unit.source: IIS supports specifying multiple IIS bindings per site, which results in multiple base addresses per scheme.
trans-unit.target: IIS 支持一个站点指定多个 IIS 绑定，这会导致一个方案有多个基址。

trans-unit.source: However, a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] service hosted under a site allows binding to only one baseAddress per scheme.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在一个站点下承载的 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 服务允许每个方案只绑定一个 BbaseAddress。

trans-unit.source: To enable multiple IIS bindings per site for a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] service, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用每个站点的多个 IIS 绑定[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)]服务，将此属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Notice that multiple site binding is supported only for the HTTP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，仅对 HTTP 协议支持多个站点绑定。

trans-unit.source: The address of endpoints in the configuration file needs to be a complete URI.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件中的终结点地址需要是一个完整的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of configuration elements that activates a service and can be merged across a hierarchy of configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个配置元素的集合，这些配置元素将激活服务并可在配置文件的层次结构中进行合并。

trans-unit.source: A collection of configuration elements that activates a service and can be merged across a hierarchy of configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 一个配置元素的集合，这些配置元素将激活服务并可在配置文件的层次结构中进行合并。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of types that implement the specific transport.
trans-unit.target: 获取实现特定传输的类型的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.TransportConfigurationTypeElementCollection" /> that contains all the types that implement the specific transport.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.TransportConfigurationTypeElementCollection" />，包含实现特定传输的所有类型。
